content: needle back through the top and out the bottom pull to define the next segment repeat this process 5-6 times evenly spacing the segments around the pumpkin 4 secure knot the yarn at the bottom of the pumpkin and weave in the end stem optional you can also glue in a cinnamon stick or twig from outside 1 in a colour of your choice chain 20 for a longer curl chain more 2 curl starting in the 2nd chain from the hook work 3 single_crochet double_crochet in each remaining chain down the chain 3 attach fasten_off leaving a long tail use a tapestry needle to sew the curly stem to the center top of the pumpkin leaf optional 1 in a colour of your choice start with a magic_ring or chain 5 and slip_stitch in the last chain from the hook to form a ring work all stitches go into the ring 2 chain 2 1 double_crochet 1 treble_crochet 1 double_crochet 1 half_double_crochet 1 single_crochet 3 chain 2 1sc 1hdc 1dc 1 treble_crochet 1dc 1sc 4 slip_stitch into the ch2 from round 1 5 pull yarn tail to close the ring tight 6 fasten_off leaving a long tail sew the leaf to the top of the pumpkin next to the stem and there you have the complete recipe to make your own crocheted pumpkin if you do make a pumpkin using this pattern please kindly credit me as the pattern designer and follow me on your socials dawn follow the tutorial on youtube my socials the woven almanac podcast @dawnsdays dawnsdays
